name: Gravity Purifier

specifications.filtrationTechnology: Utilizes Ultra Filtration (UF) or Hollow Fiber Membrane
stagesOfFiltration: Activated carbon to remove chlorine, odors, and organic compounds
UF membrane to remove bacteria and cysts
specifications.flowRate: Typically around 1 to 2 liters per hour
specifications.maintenance: Periodic cleaning of filters; filter replacement every 6 months to 1 year, depending on usage and water quality

benefits: Cost-Effective: Lower initial and maintenance costs compared to RO purifiers
Eco-Friendly: No water wastage and no electricity consumption
Ease of Use: Simple setup and operation
Health Benefits: Effectively removes harmful bacteria and cysts, improving water safety
Portability: Can be easily moved and used in different locations
Suitable for Various Water Sources: Effective for use with municipal water supplies and other sources with low Total Dissolved Solids (TDS)
